div.p: Cyclic voltammetry (CV) of BTC6 ( a) and BTC0 ( b) in a dichloromethane solution containing the electrolyte 0.1 M NBu 4PF 6. The compounds were measured at a concentration of 10 -3 M in the electrolyte solution, with an Ag wire reference electrode and a Pt disk working electrode (scan rate = 100 mV s âˆ’1). Ferrocene was used as an internal standard. Differential pulse voltammetry (DPV) was measured using the same electrolyte with 50 ms pulse width, 50 mV amplitude, 200 ms pulse period, and 4 mV potential increment.
